    public class ArticleView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Settings panel for specific to Article fields

      • issnUpdateByName

        private void issnUpdateByName()
        Fired on issnName change. Checks if Issn with issnName.getSelectedItem() exists, if exists updates issnNum, if not shows IssnAdder window.

      • issnUpdateByNum

        private void issnUpdateByNum()
        Fired on issnNum change. Checks if Issn with issnNum.getSelectedItem() exists, if exists updates issnName, if not shows IssnAdder window.

      • updateIssn

        public void updateIssn()
        Updates ComboBox models with data from IssnModel. Sets selected item to article issn.
